name: pnp-add-users-associatedspgroup-site-csv-file
title: Add users to the Associated SharePoint Groups of a site from a CSV File
shortDescription: Script which adds multiple users to associated SharePoint groups.
longDescription: This is a script which adds multiple users to associated SharePoint groups (Owners, Members, Visitors) of a site from a CSV file.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
